QueryDefination.QueryString: select RO.SalesId, RO.EchMsgPartnerId, RO.EchMsgPartnerExtCode , SO.SalesId, SO.EchMsgPartnerId, SO.EchMsgPartnerExtCode, SO.CreatedBy from SalesTable RO inner join SalesTable SO on RO.DataAreaId = SO.DataAreaId and SO.SalesType = 3 -- Sales Order and RO.ReturnItemNum = SO.ReturnItemNum where RO.DataAreaId = 'las' and RO.SalesType = 4 -- Return Order and RO.SalesId = @ReturnSalesId -- {ReturnSalesId}
